title: Haiku
description: Haiku is arguably the most micro of micro poetry. Three lines, a trio of images, and that's that. This collection was brought about with prompts from two consecutive years of NaHaiWriMo and a number of collaborative prompts from fellow Haiku fanatics.There are six themes. Outside, Inside, The Day Flows, Seven Deadly Sins, Gothic, and the Love Edition.
author: E.M. McConnell
